attribute.description: ID of the attribute of which the value should be checked. See [Minecraft Wiki: Attribute (Attributes)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/attribute) for a list of vanilla attributes that can be checked for.
attribute.markdownDescription: ID of the attribute of which the value should be checked. See [Minecraft Wiki: Attribute (Attributes)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/attribute) for a list of vanilla attributes that can be checked for.

comparison.description: How to compare the attribute's value to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How to compare the attribute's value to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the attribute's value to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the attribute's value to.
